definition: variant of 連綿|连绵[lian2 mian2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
two-syllable word featuring alliteration or rhyme, such as 玲瓏|玲珑[ling2 long2]

sentences.english: And the article puts emphasis on a developmental historical point of view on the research of binome words.
sentences.chinese: 並強調研究聯綿詞應堅持發展的歷史觀。
